entities.description: The number of months on welfare, including the imputation indicator.
The total income of the respondent, including the imputation indicator and revised imputation categories.
The total family income, including the imputation indicator and revised imputation categories.
Indicator of whether the data is questionnaire data, statistically imputed data, or a legitimate skip.

relationships.description: Indicates the type of data imputation for survey metrics.
Reports the number of months the respondent has been on welfare.
Reports the total income of the respondent with revised imputation categories.
Reports the total family income with revised imputation categories.
